short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to store the links to interact later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing our Chrome extension, your digital bookmark companion! Say goodbye to forgetting those intriguing articles, fascinating webpages, or helpful resources. Our extension lets you effortlessly save links for later interaction, ensuring you never lose track of valuable content. With just a click, you can stash away any link, allowing you to curate a personalized collection to revisit at your convenience. It's your pocket-sized memory for the web, helping you stay organized and in control of your online discoveries.
